instructions: Open the email, tap the Reply button , then tap Flag. To choose a color for the flag, tap a colored dot. To change or remove a flag, open the email, tap the Reply button , then select another color, or tap the Unmark Email button .
While viewing an email, tap the name or email address of a person in the email. Tap Add to VIP.
Open an email in the conversation. Tap the Reply button , then tap Mute.

Tap the Filter emails button in the bottom-left corner of a mailbox list. Tap Filtered by. Select or turn on the criteria for emails you want to view. Tap the Filter emails button in the bottom-left corner to hide emails that don t match the current filters. Tap again to turn the filter off.
Tap the Messaging Apps button to open the app drawer. Tap the Store button , then tap Visit Store to browse for iMessage apps.

In a conversation, tap an iMessage app in the app drawer. Tap an item in the iMessage app to add it to a message bubble. Add a comment if you want, then tap the Send button to send your message or the Remove button to cancel.

In a conversation, tap a sticker app in the app drawer. Touch and hold a sticker, then drag it anywhere in the conversation. Before you release it, you can do any of the following: Adjust the angle: Rotate a second finger around the finger dragging the sticker. Adjust the size: Move a second finger closer to or away from the finger dragging the sticker. You can place the sticker on top of a message bubble, put it on another sticker, or even dress up a photo.

Tap the More button in the app drawer. Tap Edit, then do any of the following with your iMessage apps: Reorder apps: Drag the Reorder button . Add an app to your Favorites: Tap the Add button . Remove an app from your Favorites: Tap the Delete button . Hide an app: Turn the app off. Delete an app: Swipe left on the app, then tap Delete.
Tap any subscribe or free trial button shown in a magazine or story in News. Follow the onscreen instructions. You may be asked to sign in using your Apple ID.

Open Imo and your phone number will be inserted into the text box automatically, but if not, type it in manually. Note : If you're on a tablet or phone that doesn't have a number attached to it, enter any phone number to which you have access. For example, if you're on your iPad , enter your cell phone number. Tap Next . Type the code sent to your cell phone into the space provided in the Imo app. Enter your name if asked. Tap Get Started . Add a profile image or tap Skip to do it later.

Click Yes to the question about whether you have Imo on your phone. Enter your phone number in the space provided. Click Agree and Continue . Locate the code sent to the Imo app on your phone or tablet, and type it into the space provided on your computer. Hit Enter on your keyboard .
